title: Between Madison and Palmetto
description: Margaret and Maizon are back together on Madison Street, but their friendship is different now. Margaret needs more time alone, and it's not just the two of them any more-their new neighbor and classmate, Caroline, has become part of their lives. But that seems minor next to what is about to happen to Maizon. . . ."Woodson's candid assessments of relations between blacks and whites are as searching as ever, and her characters just as commanding." ( Publishers Weekly )
author: Jacqueline Woodson
